title: Football Delhi
text:
Football Delhi (formerly "Delhi Soccer Association") is one of the 37 <a href="Indian%20state%20football%20associations">Indian state football associations</a> that are affiliated to the <a href="All%20India%20Football%20Federation">All India Football Federation</a>. It is the state-level governing body of <a href="association%20football">football</a>-related sports in <a href="Delhi">Delhi</a>, <a href="India">India</a>. The <a href="Delhi%20football%20team">Delhi football team</a> is also administered by Football Delhi.
Competitions.
Men's.
Football Delhi organises <a href="Football%20Delhi%20Senior%20Division%20League">FD Senior Division</a> in the state. FD Senior Division operates on <a href="promotion%20and%20relegation">promotion-relegation</a> with FD A Division. A-Division operates on promotion-relegation with FD B-Division.
Affiliated clubs.
Men's.
Note:
